link.description:
The story of Open Nexus OS begins with a simple belief:
computing should serve people, not platforms.

Today, every device is a walled garden.
Your phone, your desktop, your car — each trapped in its own ecosystem.
We think that’s backwards.

Open Nexus is our answer:
a unified, open operating system built in Rust, powered by a Redox microkernel,
and designed to run everywhere — mobile, desktop, IoT, and beyond.

This chapter introduces the vision, the people we’re building it for,
and the roadmap that will take us there.
